column4: hey ive just installed ubuntu and ive got to say im impressed! i have a few questions tho. Will my Ipod just plug in and work? and which torrnet app is best?
your IPOD will be mounted as external disk drive
there is no best torrent program, depends on your needs, do you want a GUI or just the console
you'll have to use it with screen then,  otherwise you'll close rtorrent when you close your ssh client
